title: Running for life
creator_credit: Jack T. O'Grady and National Educational Television
brief_description: Gives the results of a two year experiment sponsored by the US Office of Public Health, to determine the effects of exercise on middle-aged persons - and whether such exercising can reduce the chances of heart disease. Shows faculty members of the University of Wisconsin exercising and reporting of their experiences.
